text: At the Day 2 #KubeCon keynote @holly_cummins discusses carbon emissions and "kube sprawl" in a great talk on "How to Love K8s and Not Wreck the Planet" https://t.co/8jywPXqGpT

author.description: @RedMonk analyst, medievalist, and tech comm fangirl. Author of Neomedievalism, Popular Culture, and the Academy (@boydellbrewer). She/her.
